metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9818 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A race condition is present in the crash generation server used to generate data for the crash reporter. This issue can lead to a use-after-free in the main process, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash and a sandbox escape. *Note: this vulnerability only affects Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 60.7, Firefox < 67, and Firefox ESR < 60.7.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine chrisccoulson> Windows only bug

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
